metadata.synopsis: Astarion tells you about the illusory wall that hides the door to the Kennel.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Origin Debug Book (Ctrl+Shift+7 )Astarion - Recruit - As Avatar / CompanionAstarion - Teleport To - Act 3 - Cazador's Palace - KennelWalk in the direction the characters are looking

0.speaker: Astarion
0.text: And this is the kennel - a wretched little cell Cazador would lock us in when he was displeased.

2.speaker: Astarion
2.text: Behold, one of Cazador's cheapest tricks: an illusionary wall.

1.speaker: Astarion
1.text: And behind it is the kennel - a fetid little cell he'd throw us into when displeased.
